articles.title: Kremlin warns of more asset seizures after move against Fortum and Uniper - Reuters
articles.description: The Kremlin said on Wednesday it could seize more Western assets in retaliation for foreign moves against Russian companies, after taking temporary control of assets belonging to two European state-owned utilities.
articles.content: HELSINKI, April 26 (Reuters) - The Kremlin said on Wednesday it could seize more Western assets in retaliation for foreign moves against Russian companies, after taking temporary control of assets be… [+4905 chars]
